actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
House Committee on House Administration Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for continuing expenses of investigations and studies by standing and select committees of the House from January 3, 1986, through March 31, 1986.

summary.text: Authorizes amounts out of the contingent fund of the House of Representatives for the continuance of necessary investigations and studies by select and standing committees from January 3, 1986, through March 31, 1986.

titles.title: A resolution providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for continuing expenses of investigations and studies by standing and select committees of the House from January 3, 1986, through March 31, 1986.
